_description: Warning about forswearing, translating ‘semel periurus semper periurius exstat’ — three monorhyming lines and concluding line

CamTCC323.Transcription:
Wose is ene firsuorentbote he come to amendmentlif & soule
                    he Wrt iscenthe is ever firt
CamTCC323.Editions:
James,  Montague Rhodes. 
             Catalogue of the
                    Western Manuscripts in the Library of Trinity College, Cambridge.
         4 vols. Cambridge: at the UP, 1900-1904: 1.440.
